name.vi: Hộp tăng nguyên tố phòng thủ

description.en: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.ar: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.br: Esta caixa contém uma Pedra de Defesa por elemento natural, aumentando a Defesa Elemental em 20% por 1 hora. O elemento de cada Pedra deve corresponder ao elemento do Traje.
description.cns: 这个箱子包含每个自然元素一块防御石头，1小时内增加20%元素属性防御。每块石头的元素必须与防具的元素相匹配。
description.de: Diese Box enthält einen Verteidigungsstein pro natürlichem Element, der die elementare Verteidigung für eine Stunde um 20% erhöht. Das Element des Steines muss dem Element der Rüstung entsprechen.
description.fi: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.fil: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.fr: Cette boîte contient une Pierre de Défense Élémentaire pour chaque élément, ajoutant à votre armure 20% de défense élémentaire pendant 1 heure. Chaque pierre ne peut être utilisée qu'avec une armure du même élément.
description.id: Kotak ini berisi satu Defense Stone per elemen alami, meningkatkan Element Defense sebesar 20% selama 1 jam. Setiap elemen Stone harus sesuai dengan elemen Suit.
description.it: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.jp: このボックスの中には1つだけ属性の防御力がアップするストーンが入っています。そのストーンを使用すると1時間、属性防御力が20%増加します。各属性ストーンと、使用するスーツの属性が一致していなければいけません。
description.kr: 이 박스는 속성당 하나의 방어스톤을 포함하고, 속성 방어력을 1시간동안 20% 증가시킵니다. 각 스톤의 속성은 방어구의 속성과 일치해야 합니다.
description.nl: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.pl: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.ru: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.sp: Esta caja contiene una Piedra de Defensa de cada elemento natural, lo que aumenta la Defensa Elemental en un 20% durante 1 hora. El elemento de cada Piedra debe coincidir con el elemento del Traje.
description.sw: This box contains one Defense Stone per natural element, increasing Element Defense by 20% for 1 hour. Each Stone's element must match the Suit's element.
description.th: กล่องนี้บรรจุหินป้องกัน 1 ก้อนต่อธาตุธรรมชาติ เพิ่มการป้องกันธาตุ 20% เป็นเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง ธาตุของหินแต่ละชิ้นต้องตรงกับธาตุของชุด
description.tw: 這個箱子包含每個自然屬性的防禦石，在 1 小時內增加 20% 的防禦屬性，每塊石頭的屬性必須與套裝的屬性相匹配。
description.vi: Hộp này chứa một Đá Phòng thủ cho mỗi nguyên tố tự nhiên, tăng Phòng thủ Nguyên tố lên 20% trong 1 giờ. Mỗi phần tử của Đá phải phù hợp với phần tử của Bộ đồ.
